data.text: Edin pa yɛ sene ahonya bebrebe;
Ɔdefoɔ ne ohiani wɔ adeɛ baako,
Onitefoɔ hunu amanehunu a ɛreba na ɔhinta ne ho,
Ahobrɛaseɛ ne Awurade suro
Nkasɛɛ ne mfidie wɔ amumuyɛfoɔ akwan so,
Kyerɛ abɔfra ɛkwan a ɔmfa so,
Adefoɔ di ahiafoɔ so,
Deɛ ɔdua amumuyɛsɛm no twa ɔhaw
Ɔyamyɛfoɔ bɛnya nhyira
Pam ɔfɛdifoɔ na basabasayɛ nso bɛkɔ;
Obi a ɔdɔ akoma a emu teɛ na ne kasa ho yɛ nyam
Awurade ani wɛn nimdeɛ,
Ɔkwadwofoɔ ka sɛ, “Gyata bi wɔ mfikyire hɔ!”
Ɔbaa waresɛefoɔ anomu yɛ amena donkudonku;
Agyimisɛm kyekyere abɔfra akoma ho,
Obi bɛsisi ohiani de apɛ ahonya
Yɛ aso na tie anyansasɛm yi;
ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ sɛ wokora saa nsɛm yi wɔ wʼakoma mu,
Sɛdeɛ wode wo ho bɛto Awurade so,
Mentwerɛɛ mmɛ aduasa mmaa wo,
a ɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo nokorɛ ne deɛ akyinnyeɛ nni ho,
Mmɔ ahiafoɔ korɔno, sɛ wɔyɛ ahiafoɔ enti,
ɛfiri sɛ Awurade bɛdi wɔn asɛm ama wɔn
Mfa obi a ne bo ha no adamfo,
anyɛ saa a, wobɛsua nʼakwan
Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔde ne nsa hyɛ krataa ase di agyinamu,
na sɛ wonni deɛ wɔde tua a
Ntutu tete aboɔ a wɔde ato hyeɛ;
Wohunu odwumayɛfoɔ a ne nsa akokwa nʼadwuma ho anaa?
